lead_paragraph: Erik Zabel of Germany won the fourth stage of the Spanish Vuelta in a sprint finish yesterday, while Thor Hushovd of Norway retained the overall lead. Zabel, of the Milram team, finished in 3 hours 24 minutes 46 seconds. Hushovd, of Crédit Agricole, finished in the same time and has a 27-second lead on Zabel.
